variable.name: param
variable.defaultValue: groovyScript("def result=''; def params=\"${_1}\".replaceAll('[\\\\[|\\\\]|\\\\s]', '').split(',').toList(); for(i = 0; i < params.size(); i++) {if(params[i] == '') continue;if(i==0) result += params[0]+((params.size()==1)?'':'\\n');else{ result+=' * @param ' + params[i] + ((i < params.size() - 1) ? '\\n' : '')}}; return result", methodParameters())
